title: Śrīla Bhakti Vinod Ṭhākur
author: by Śrīla Bhakti Rakṣak Śrīdhar Dev-Goswāmī Mahārāj

translation: “I bow to Śrī Ṭhākur Bhakti Vinod,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Mahāprabhu’s love divine personified.<br class="SongVerse__break" />He’s the king of all knowers<br class="SongVerse__break" />of the purpose of the Scriptures,<br class="SongVerse__break" />and he is the ocean<br class="SongVerse__break" />of Śrī Rādhā’s devotion.”
